materials.name: Hearty Durian
materials.desc: This fruit's odor earned it the nickname "king of fruits". It offers immense restorative power; dishes cooked with it will temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

materials.name: Palm Fruit
materials.desc: Fruit from palm trees that grow near the ocean. It doesn't offer any special effects but will increase your heart recovery when used as an ingredient.

materials.name: Apple
materials.desc: A common fruit found on trees all around Hyrule. Eat it fresh, or cook it to increase its effect.

materials.name: Wildberry
materials.desc: A fruit that grows in cold, snowy regions known for its tangy, sweet flavor. It doesn't offer any special effects, but it's a popular cooking ingredient.

materials.name: Hydromelon
materials.desc: This resilient fruit can flourish even in the heat of the desert. The hydrating liquid inside provides a cooling effect that, when cooked, increases your heat resistance.

materials.name: Spicy Pepper
materials.desc: This pepper is exploding with spice. Cook with it to create dishes that will raise your body temperature and help you withstand the cold.

materials.name: Voltfruit
materials.desc: Cacti found in the Gerudo Desert bear this sweet fruit. It's naturally insulated, so when cooked into a dish, it provides resistance against electricity.

materials.name: Fleet-Lotus Seeds
materials.desc: The plant that bears these seeds grows near deep water. The roots draw nutrients from the water, which boosts your movement speed when the seeds are cooked into a dish.

materials.name: Mighty Bananas
materials.desc: This fruit grows mainly in tropical forests of the Faron region. When it's used as an ingredient, the resulting dish will temporarily increase your attack power.

materials.name: Big Hearty Truffle
materials.desc: Years of going unpicked have allowed this hearty truffle to grow quite large. It's chock-full of nutrients. When cooked into a dish, it temporarily increases your maximum hearts.

materials.name: Hearty Truffle
materials.desc: This rare mushroom has a rich scent. Cook it before eating to temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

materials.name: Hylian Shroom
materials.desc: A common mushroom found near trees around Hyrule. Eat it to restore half a heart.

materials.name: Endura Shroom
materials.desc: A rare yellowish-orange mushroom. Cook it before eating to temporarily increase your stamina limit.

materials.name: Stamella Shroom
materials.desc: A green mushroom that grows near trees in the forest. It's chock-full of natural energy. Cook it to release its stamina-restoration properties.

materials.name: Chillshroom
materials.desc: Often found at the base of pine trees in cold climates, these mushrooms are cool to the touch and can be used to cook dishes that allow you to stay cool even in arid regions.

materials.name: Sunshroom
materials.desc: A bright red mushroom that grows in hot climates. Imbued with the power of heat, they can be used to cook dishes that will allow you to endure the bitter cold.

materials.name: Zapshroom
materials.desc: This mushroom grows wild in the Gerudo region. The cap is naturally insulated, so when used in cooking, it will offer protection against electricity.

materials.name: Rushroom
materials.desc: A mushroom that can grow almost anywhere but prefers ceilings and sheer cliffs. Cook it before eating to temporarily increase your movement speed.

materials.name: Razorshroom
materials.desc: This mushroom is known for the natural slice in its cap. Eating it fosters your competitive spirit. Use it when cooking to prepare a dish that will increase your strength.

materials.name: Ironshroom
materials.desc: The cap of this mushroom is very hard. Use it when cooking to prepare a dish that increases your defense.

materials.name: Silent Shroom
materials.desc: A strange mushroom that glows quietly in the forest at night. Cooking it into a dish unlocks the nutrients in its cap, resulting in a meal that will allow you to move stealthily.

materials.name: Big Hearty Radish
materials.desc: This hearty radish has grown much larger than the average radish. It's rich in analeptic compounds that, when cooked into a dish, temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

materials.name: Hearty Radish
materials.desc: A rare radish that grows best in sunny plains. Cook it before eating to temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

materials.name: Endura Carrot
materials.desc: Highly valued as a medicinal plant, this carrot contains large amounts of nourishing energy. When cooked into a dish, it boosts your stamina beyond its maximum limit.

materials.name: Hyrule Herb
materials.desc: This healthy herb grows abundantly in the plains of Hyrule. Cook it before eating to increase the number of hearts it restores.

materials.name: Swift Carrot
materials.desc: This carrot is cultivated extensively in Kakariko Village. It strengthens the legs and hips when cooked into a dish, which helps increase your movement speed.

materials.name: Fortified Pumpkin
materials.desc: An extremely tough pumpkin raised in village fields. When cooked, that toughness manifests itself by considerably upping defense.

materials.name: Cool Safflina
materials.desc: This medicinal plant grows in high elevations, such as mountains in the Hebra or Gerudo regions. When cooked into a dish, it will temporarily increase your heat resistance.

materials.name: Warm Safflina
materials.desc: This medicinal plant grows in hot regions, such as the Gerudo Desert. It's warm to the touch and increases your cold resistance when cooked into a dish.

materials.name: Electric Safflina
materials.desc: This medicinal plant grows abundantly in the Gerudo Desert. Its peculiar fibers conduct electricity, which will increase your electricity resistance when cooked into a dish.

materials.name: Swift Violet
materials.desc: This vitality-rich flower blooms mainly on cliffsides. When cooked into a dish, the nourishing compounds increase your movement speed.

materials.name: Mighty Thistle
materials.desc: This medicinal plant is known for its sharp thorns and for the fruit it bears. The fruit contains a compound that increases attack power when cooked into a dish.

materials.name: Armoranth
materials.desc: This tough medicinal plant cannot be broken, but it can be cooked. Its durable yet flexible fibers raise your defense when cooked into a dish.

materials.name: Blue Nightshade
materials.desc: A plant that grows in quieter areas of Hyrule. At night, it gives off a soft glow. Cook with it to increase your stealth.

materials.name: Silent Princess
materials.desc: This lovely flower was said to have been a favorite of the princess of Hyrule. Once feared to have gone extinct, it's recently been spotted growing in the wild.

materials.name: Raw Gourmet Meat
materials.desc: This prized cut of meat is usually from a large animal. Any connoisseur would rank this tender, juicy cut of meat "gourmet." Expect an exquisite meal when cooking with this.

materials.name: Raw Whole Bird
materials.desc: This prized meat can be obtained from certain birds. It gets full points for flavor, nutrition, and volume. It pairs perfectly with other ingredients or can be enjoyed alone.

materials.name: Raw Prime Meat
materials.desc: A fresh, high-quality piece of animal meat. This stuff isn't easy to come by, so savor it. Cook it to recover more hearts.

materials.name: Raw Bird Thigh
materials.desc: A high-quality piece of meat that's hard to come by. You can eat it raw, but cooking it first will recover more hearts.

materials.name: Raw Meat
materials.desc: Meat obtained from animals in plains and forests. You can eat it raw, but cooking it will make it more delicious and nutritious.

materials.name: Raw Bird Drumstick
materials.desc: This meat is tougher and chewier than a standard steak. Tastes better cooked.

materials.name: Courser Bee Honey
materials.desc: Honey straight from the hive is chock-full of nutrients. Cooking this into a meal unlocks the potential of these nutrients and provides a stamina-recovery effect.

materials.name: Hylian Rice
materials.desc: This grain is a favorite among residents of Kakariko Village. It's grown in regions with a lot of water and is quite versatile. Used as an ingredient in things like risotto and rice balls.

materials.name: Acorn
materials.desc: Often found on the ground near trees. Squirrels adore this nut, so you may have competition while foraging. Add one to a meal for a nutty seasoning.

materials.name: Chickaloo Tree Nut
materials.desc: Small birds love this nut. You can eat it raw for a minor effect, but it can also be added as a spice to other recipes.

materials.name: Bird Egg
materials.desc: A fresh bird egg necessary for making dishes such as omelets and crepes. You can snag them from birds' nests if you're sneaky. Nutritious and delicious, perfect.

materials.name: Tabantha Wheat
materials.desc: This grain is cultivated extensively on the Tabantha Plains. It's ground finely with a millstone to be used in cooking. Use it to make things such as stews and breads.

materials.name: Fresh Milk
materials.desc: This fresh milk comes from Hateno cows and white goats kept in the village. It's delicious on its own but can also be used as an ingredient in soups and stews.

materials.name: Cane Sugar
materials.desc: When boiled with other ingredients, the cane breaks down into a sweet juice necessary for making cakes and other sweets. It's commonly found in ingredients stores.

materials.name: Goat Butter
materials.desc: Butter made from the milk of a domesticated white goat. In addition to being used in dishes like stews and meunière. It's often used when making cakes and other sweets.

materials.name: Goron Spice
materials.desc: Made from several types of spices, this secret Goron seasoning has been handed down for generations. An initial wave of spiciness paves the way for the sweetness.

materials.name: Rock Salt
materials.desc: Crystallized salt from the ancient sea commonly used to season meals. Cannot be eaten in this form.

materials.name: Monster Extract
materials.desc: A result of Kilton's research into monsters, this suspicious spice can be used to punch up dishes while cooking. Apparently it can be used to make a number of monstrous meals.

materials.name: Star Fragment
materials.desc: A mysterious stone fragment that fell from the sky. It looks like it would fetch a good price, but you may be able to use it in certain recipes as well.

materials.name: Dinraal's Scale
materials.desc: This precious scale fell from the red spirit Dinraal. It emanates a great heat, You can use it in cooking, but eating it seems like a waste.

materials.name: Dinraal's Claw
materials.desc: This valuable claw was plucked from the red spirit Dinraal. It was extremely hot before it was removed. You could sell it to a store, but it must have some other use.

materials.name: Shard of Dinraal's Fang
materials.desc: This shard fell from the red spirit Dinraal's fang. It's exceptionally hard and therefore impossible to process, but apparently it can be used as a material for something.

materials.name: Shard of Dinraal's Horn
materials.desc: This shard chipped and fell off the red spirit Dinraal. Its horn is said to be the crystallized power of fire itself. It sells for a high price, but rumors say there's some other use for it.

materials.name: Naydra's Scale
materials.desc: This precious scale fell from the blue spirit Naydra. It contains a bitter cold within. You can use it in cooking, but just eating it seems like a waste.

materials.name: Naydra's Claw
materials.desc: This valuable claw was plucked from the blue spirit Naydra. It was freezing cold before it was removed. You could sell it, but there must be some other use for it.

materials.name: Shard of Naydra's Fang
materials.desc: This shard fell from the blue spirit Naydra's fang. It's much harder than any metal, so it's impossible to process. Yet rumors say it can be used as a material for something.

materials.name: Shard of Naydra's Horn
materials.desc: This shard chipped and fell off the blue spirit Naydra. It's said the horn is the crystallized power of ice itself. It sells for quite a bit, but rumors say it has some other use.

materials.name: Farosh's Scale
materials.desc: This precious scale fell from the golden spirit Farosh. It contains powerful electricity within. You can cook it, but eating it seems like a waste.

materials.name: Farosh's Claw
materials.desc: This claw was plucked from the golden spirit Farosh. Its electricity was expelled before it was removed, so it's safe to handle. A store will buy it, but it must have some other use.

materials.name: Shard of Farosh's Fang
materials.desc: This shard fell from the golden spirit Farosh's fang. It's so hard, hammers bounce right off it, so it's impossible to process. Yet rumors say it does have some use as a material.

materials.name: Shard of Farosh's Horn
materials.desc: This shard fell off the golden spirit Farosh. It's said the horn is the crystallized power of electricity itself. It sells for a lot, but there must be some other use for it.

materials.name: Hearty Salmon
materials.desc: This fish makes its home in cold water, giving it extra layers of fat. It temporarily increases your maximum hearts when used in cooking.

materials.name: Hearty Bass
materials.desc: This large fish lives near the shoreline. Its sizable body can restore a lot of nutrient. When cooked into a dish, it will temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

materials.name: Hyrule Bass
materials.desc: An ordinary fish that can be found all over Hyrule. Can be eaten raw, but cooking it amplifies its healing benefits.

materials.name: Staminoka Bass
materials.desc: This Hyrule bass got to be the biggest fish by never getting caught (until now). Its long life results in a cooked dish that will restore a lot of stamina.

materials.name: Chillfin Trout
materials.desc: This blue trout prefers cold bodies of water. Its skin contains enzymes that keep its body cool, and when cooked into a dish, it will temporarily boost your heat resistance.

materials.name: Sizzlefin Trout
materials.desc: This red trout prefers warm bodies of water. It has a special organ specifically for storing heat. When cooked into a dish, it temporarily boosts your resistance to the cold.

materials.name: Voltfin Trout
materials.desc: This trout makes its home in the freshwater lakes. Its scales have an insulating compound that, when cooked into a dish, offers resistance to electricity.

materials.name: Stealthfin Trout
materials.desc: Consuming the bioluminescent compound that makes this fish glow in the dark will increase concentration. Dishes cooked with it will suppress noise when consumed.

materials.name: Mighty Carp
materials.desc: This freshwater fish lives alongside its less mighty carp ilk. A compound in its liver promotes muscle growth. Dishes cooked with it will temporarily increase your attack power.

materials.name: Armored Carp
materials.desc: Calcium deposits in the scales of this ancient fish make them as hard as armor. Cooking it into a dish will fortify your bones, temporarily increasing your defense.

materials.name: Sanke Carp
materials.desc: This wild armored carp has been bred into a prizewinning fish. Its beautifully colored markings do not occur in nature. It offers no special effects when cooked.

materials.name: Mighty Porgy
materials.desc: This ocean-dwelling fish comes with one rude attitude. The compounds in its flesh elevate your competitive spirit when it's cooked into a dish, thus increasing your attack power.

materials.name: Armored Porgy
materials.desc: This porgy's body is covered in armor-hard scales. The compounds in its scales, when cooked into a dish, fortify your bones and temporarily boost your defense.

materials.name: Sneaky River Snail
materials.desc: This large, glow-in-the-dark snail lives in fresh water. When cooked into a dish, it heightens your senses so you can move about silently.

materials.name: Hearty Blueshell Snail
materials.desc: This snail lives on sandy beaches in large numbers. Its flesh contains a high amount of stimulants, so when cooked into a dish, it temporarily increases your maximum hearts.

materials.name: Razorclaw Crab
materials.desc: This crab is well known for its exceptionally sharp pincers. When cooked, the strength compound in its claws will increase your attack power.

materials.name: Ironshell Crab
materials.desc: This crab's shell is particularly hard. When cooked into a dish, its fat and meat bolster the body to increase your defense.

materials.name: Bright-Eyed Crab
materials.desc: This crab appears in large numbers when it rains. On bite of its delectable meat, and you'll forget all your exhaustion. Replenishes your stamina when cooked into a dish.

materials.name: Fairy
materials.desc: This fairy will fly from your pouch and heal all your wounds the moment you lose your last heart. It's easily mistaken for a firefly at first, but it glows in the daylight as well as night.

materials.name: Winterwing Butterfly
materials.desc: The powdery scales of this butterfly's wings cool the air around it. Watching it flutter around snowflakes is a thing of beauty. Cook it with monster parts for a heat-resistant elixir.

materials.name: Summerwing Butterfly
materials.desc: A butterfly found in the woods and plains of warm regions. Its wings absorb the warmth of the sun. Cook it with monster parts to create an elixir that makes you feel warm and fuzzy.

materials.name: Thunderwing Butterfly
materials.desc: This rare butterfly only shows itself when it rains. The organs in its body produce an insulating compound. When made into an elixir, it offers electrical resistance.

materials.name: Smotherwing Butterfly
materials.desc: This rare butterfly lives in volcanic regions. Its body contains a heat-resistant liquid, which can be turned into a topical elixir that offers resistance to flames.

materials.name: Cold Darner
materials.desc: This dragonfly prefers the cool shade of trees to the warmth of the sun. Its wings disperse heat from its body, which can be cooked into a heat-resistant elixir.

materials.name: Warm Darner
materials.desc: This dragonfly has a special organ that causes it to sweat profusely. Cook it with monster parts for an elixir that will raise your core temperatures so you can resist the cold.

materials.name: Electric Darner
materials.desc: This rare dragonfly only appears in the rain. Its wings direct electricity away from its body. Cook it with monster parts for an electricity-resistant elixir.

materials.name: Restless Cricket
materials.desc: A very energetic cricket. Cook it with monster parts to create a stamina-recovery elixir.

materials.name: Bladed Rhino Beetle
materials.desc: This beetle's razor-sharp horns demand that you handle it with care. Boil the horns alongside monster parts to concoct an elixir that will raise your attack power.

materials.name: Rugged Rhino Beetle
materials.desc: This beetle's hard body resembles armor. When the shell is cooked with monster parts, the resulting elixir boosts your defense.

materials.name: Energetic Rhino Beetle
materials.desc: This valuable beetle can live up to ten years. When cooked with monster parts, its impressive vitality translates into an elixir that will greatly restore your stamina.

materials.name: Sunset Firefly
materials.desc: These fireflies glow gently in the dark. When cooked with monster parts, the compound that causes it to glow results in an elixir that will allow you to move more quietly.

materials.name: Hot-Footed Frog
materials.desc: A quick frog that can be found hopping around near water. Cook it with monster parts to draw out its speed-boost effect.

materials.name: Tireless Frog
materials.desc: This rare frog only ventures out in the rain. When cooked with monster parts, the elixir it produces will temporarily increase your maximum stamina.

materials.name: Hightail Lizard
materials.desc: A lizard found throughout Hyrule. It's a bit slow to react at times, but if given a chance to escape, it will dart off quickly. Cook it with monster parts for a speed-boosting elixir.

materials.name: Hearty Lizard
materials.desc: This rare lizard lives deep in the forests. It feeds on high-nutrient foods, giving it great vitality. When used to make elixirs, they temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

materials.name: Fireproof Lizard
materials.desc: This rare lizard can only be found in the Eldin region. Its scales have heat-resistant properties, so when cooked with monster parts, it produces a heat-resistant elixir.

materials.name: Flint
materials.desc: Strike it with a metallic weapon to generate a spark. The portable fire starter breaks after one use, but it can create a long-lasting flame if you use it near firewood.

materials.name: Amber
materials.desc: A fossilized resin with a caramelesque sheen to it. It's been valued as a component in decorations and crafting since ancient times.

materials.name: Opal
materials.desc: A valuable ore that gives off a mesmerizing iridescence similar to the inside of a seashell. It contains the power of water.

materials.name: Luminous Stone
materials.desc: This mysterious mineral gives off a pale blue glow in the dark, which some believe to be souls of the undead. Apparently, this stone can be used as a base to make special clothing.

materials.name: Topaz
materials.desc: This precious yellow gem contains the power of electricity. It's been known to fetch a high price since ancient times.

materials.name: Ruby
materials.desc: A precious red gem mined from large ore deposits found throughout Hyrule. Rubies contain the power of fire and have fetched a high price since ancient times.

materials.name: Sapphire
materials.desc: A precious blue gem mined from natural rock formations. Sapphires contain the very essence of ice. They've been known to fetch a high price since ancient times.

materials.name: Diamond
materials.desc: The most precious gem one can find in Hyrule, its signature sparkle has charmed Hyruleans for generations. As such, it has sold for a very high price since ancient times.

materials.name: Bokoblin Horn
materials.desc: The severed horn of a Bokoblin, a creature often encountered on the plains of Hyrule. It isn't edible, but it can be tossed into a stew with some critters to make an elixir.

materials.name: Bokoblin Fang
materials.desc: A tooth obtained from a Bokoblin. It's worn down and not very sharp, but it's still pretty hard. Cook it alongside a critter to make an elixir.

materials.name: Bokoblin Guts
materials.desc: A rare material obtained by defeating a Bokoblin. It convulses on its own every now and then, which is really creepy, but perhaps it has a use.

materials.name: Moblin Horn
materials.desc: This splendid horn once grew atop the head of a Moblin. It can't be used in normal food recipes, but it does have some use as an ingredient in making elixirs.

materials.name: Moblin Fang
materials.desc: A sharp fang obtained from a Moblin. It's too hard to be reshaped into a tool, but it can be tossed into a stew with some critters to create elixirs.

materials.name: Moblin Guts
materials.desc: This prized ingredient can be obtained from Moblins. Its odor is too pungent for normal food preparation, but stew it with some critters to make elixirs.

materials.name: Lizalfos Horn
materials.desc: This winding horn once grew atop the head of a Lizalfos. It's too hard to use for cooking, but stores are willing to buy it from you. It can also be used to make elixirs.

materials.name: Lizalfos Talon
materials.desc: This talon once grew from the elbow of a Lizalfos. You can stew it with critters to make elixirs, but it may have some other uses, as well.

materials.name: Lizalfos Tail
materials.desc: The severed tail of a Lizalfos. It continues to wriggle even after being separated from its body. That kind of vitality makes it highly valued as an ingredient in elixirs.

materials.name: Icy Lizalfos Tail
materials.desc: The severed tail of an Ice-Breath Lizalfos. Its hard scales and flesh make it unsuitable for cooking, but it's perfect for making elixirs.

materials.name: Red Lizalfos Tail
materials.desc: The severed tail of a Fire-Breath Lizalfos. Its flavor makes the flesh inedible, but toss it into a stew with some critters, and you'll have yourself a nice elixir.

materials.name: Yellow Lizalfos Tail
materials.desc: The severed tail of an Electric Lizalfos. Its powerful stench makes it unappetizing and unfit for cooking, but it's highly valued as an ingredient for elixirs.

materials.name: Lynel Horn
materials.desc: The Lynel this horn once grew upon surely misses it. It's exceptionally hard—so hard that most blades cannot scratch it. Throw it into a stew with critters to make elixirs.

materials.name: Lynel Hoof
materials.desc: This rare ingredient can be obtained only from a Lynel's foot. It's larger and heavier than a horse's hoof. It's useful for making elixirs but may have uses beyond that.

materials.name: Lynel Guts
materials.desc: This highly sought-after ingredient can only be obtained from a Lynel. It pulses with the vitality of a Lynel, a strength that makes it invaluable as an ingredient for elixirs.

materials.name: Chuchu Jelly
materials.desc: A gelatinous substance that came from a Chuchu. It's unusable in this state, but applying a bit of elemental stimulation will change its form.

materials.name: White Chuchu Jelly
materials.desc: A jiggly substance that came from an Ice Chuchu. It's cool to the touch, and squeezing it seems to relieve stress. If struck, it will explode in a cold mist.

materials.name: Red Chuchu Jelly
materials.desc: A jiggly substance that normally comes from a Fire Chuchu. It constantly gives off heat. If struck, it will explode in a ball of flame.

materials.name: Yellow Chuchu Jelly
materials.desc: A jiggly substance that came from an Electric Chuchu. Electricity pulses through its gelatinous mass. If struck, it will explode in a burst of electric current.

materials.name: Keese Wing
materials.desc: The wing of a Keese. It's covered with very short, sharp fur. It's not much use by itself, but you can mix it with critters to make something useful.

materials.name: Ice Keese Wing
materials.desc: A rare Ice Keese wing. Its frozen surface gleams attractively, but its usefulness isn't readily apparent.

materials.name: Fire Keese Wing
materials.desc: A rare Fire Keese wing. There isn't enough Fire Keese attached to it to burn you, but it does have a slight warmth to it. It can be used as an ingredient for elixirs.

materials.name: Electric Keese Wing
materials.desc: A rare Electric Keese wing. The part of the Electric Keese that produces electricity is not in its wings, so it won't shock you. Toss it in with some critters to make elixirs.

materials.name: Keese Eyeball
materials.desc: A rare material dropped by a defeated Keese. It's fun to look at, but it doesn't seem to have much use at first glance. But it must be good for something...

materials.name: Octorok Tentacle
materials.desc: This can only be obtained from an Octorok-type enemy. It's too acidic for cooking, but it's highly valued as an ingredient for elixirs.

materials.name: Octorok Eyeball
materials.desc: This can only be obtained from an Octorok-type enemy. You can sell it to a store, or you can make elixirs with it, but it may have other uses, as well.

materials.name: Octo Balloon
materials.desc: This inflatable Octorok organ has a lot of lift, so attach it to items you want to see float. Hold it in your hands, and then place it on an object to attach it.

materials.name: Molduga Fin
materials.desc: A sturdy fin obtained from a Molduga. It can be used to make elixirs, but there may be someone willing to trade for it.

materials.name: Molduga Guts
materials.desc: A giant organ obtained from a Molduga. This invaluable ingredient is hard to come by, and its use is shrouded in mystery.

materials.name: Hinox Toenail
materials.desc: A nail obtained from a Hinox. It's as thick as a plate of armor and can be stewed with critters to make elixirs.

materials.name: Hinox Tooth
materials.desc: A tooth obtained from a Hinox. It's so large, it's hard to believe it's a real tooth. It can be used to make elixirs.

materials.name: Hinox Guts
materials.desc: A giant, smelly Hinox organ of unknown function. Upon closer inspection, it appears to be quivering, It can be used to make an elixir, but some say it has other uses, as well.

materials.name: Ancient Screw
materials.desc: A screw used in ancient machinery. It's made of an unknown material, and no matter how many times it's turned, its threads never seem to show signs of wear.

materials.name: Ancient Spring
materials.desc: A spring used in ancient machinery. It is light and buoyant enough to float on water, and no matter how many times it's compressed, it never loses tension.

materials.name: Ancient Gear
materials.desc: A gear used in ancient machinery. Despite being incredibly old, its build quality is leaps and bounds above anything built using current technology.

materials.name: Ancient Shaft
materials.desc: A machine part used in ancient machinery. It's incredibly sturdy, and it's not made of any recognizable material. It may come in handy someday.

materials.name: Ancient Core
materials.desc: This crystal was made using lost technology. At one time it was the power source for ancient machines. This item is very valuable to researchers.

materials.name: Giant Ancient Core
materials.desc: A giant energy crystal made using lost ancient technology. Cores this large are an extremely rare find. A researcher would probably know how to use this.

materials.name: Wood
materials.desc: A portable bundle of wood. You can use this to make a campfire if you have something to light it.

recipes.name: Fruitcake
recipes.desc: Making ample use of fruits found all over Hyrule, this cake is a must for celebrations.

recipes.name: Seafood Paella
recipes.desc: No fisherman's birthday bash would be complete without this top-shelf seafood dish.

recipes.name: Monster Curry
recipes.desc: This unusual take on curry uses monster extract and doesn't rely on spices.

recipes.name: Monster Rice Balls
recipes.desc: Rice balls flavored with monster extract. Their unique aroma is not for everyone.

recipes.name: Monster Cake
recipes.desc: It's said that once you have a taste of this cake, you'll never forget its sweetness.

recipes.name: Monster Soup
recipes.desc: Using monster extract as a base, this soup's distinct gaminess is either loved or hated.

recipes.name: Monster Stew
recipes.desc: Meat and seafood simmered in monster extract. A savory dish despite its ingredients.

recipes.name: Creamy Heart Soup
recipes.desc: Enjoying this sweet soup with another person will bring you both closer together.

recipes.name: Clam Chowder
recipes.desc: The nutritional value of hearty blueshell snail combines with butter and milk in a rich soup.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Stew
recipes.desc: Simply simmer a fortified pumpkin to make this dish. A favorite in Kakariko Village.

recipes.name: Gourmet Meat Stew
recipes.desc: The meat has simmered for so long it melts in your mouth. A true bucket-list meal!

recipes.name: Prime Meat Stew
recipes.desc: Letting the large portions of choice cuts of meat simmer brought out their savoriness.

recipes.name: Meat Stew
recipes.desc: The hearty meat in this mainstay dish leaves bellies satisfied all throughout Hyrule.

recipes.name: Gourmet Meat Curry
recipes.desc: The high-quality meat used in this prized dish satisfies meat and curry lovers alike.

recipes.name: Gourmet Poultry Curry
recipes.desc: Once served in Hyrule Castle, the poultry used in this dish is of immensely high quality.

recipes.name: Prime Meat Curry
recipes.desc: The high-quality meat in this curry has given it a deeper taste than most other curries.

recipes.name: Prime Poultry Curry
recipes.desc: The secret to this curry's flavor is taking it off the heat while you add the spices.

recipes.name: Meat Curry
recipes.desc: The heat from the spice allows you to enjoy the large portion of the meat's savoriness.

recipes.name: Poultry Curry
recipes.desc: The savory meat pairs well with the aroma of spice in this common curry.

recipes.name: Seafood Curry
recipes.desc: This dish brims with treasures from the sea. Its spice packs a kick, so it's not for kids.

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
recipes.desc: This healthy curry is popular for its mild flavor and moderate spiciness.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Pie
recipes.desc: The intense sweetness of fortified pumpkins makes this dessert popular among children.

recipes.name: Carrot Cake
recipes.desc: Even those who don't like carrots tend to enjoy the mild sweetness of this cake.

recipes.name: Wildberry Crepe
recipes.desc: Sweet, tart wildberries are folded into thin, springy dough to make this dessert.

recipes.name: Honey Crepe
recipes.desc: Honey has been drizzled over thin crepes to bring out their natural sweetness and flavor.

recipes.name: Plain Crepe
recipes.desc: The simplicity of this dish lets the flavor of its ingredients shine.

recipes.name: Apple Pie
recipes.desc: The crispy, flaky pie crust and sweet apples are a match made in heaven.

recipes.name: Nutcake
recipes.desc: Forest nuts give this cake a pleasant texture and a simple, understated sweetness.

recipes.name: Egg Tart
recipes.desc: You'll know this simple dessert is done baking when it smells just delightful.

recipes.name: Egg Pudding
recipes.desc: Made by cooking eggs and milk in a special mold, its soft texture melts in your mouth.

recipes.name: Fried Bananas
recipes.desc: Children love fried mighty bananas. The trick is frying them over very high heat.

recipes.name: Fruit Pie
recipes.desc: A celebration isn't a celebration until this fruit-filled crust hits the table!

recipes.name: Meat Pie
recipes.desc: You'll need an extra napkin to deal with this juicy pie of perfectly baked minced meat.

recipes.name: Fish Pie
recipes.desc: A mainstay in any fisherman's home, the crisp crust pairs well with the fishy flavor.

recipes.name: Salmon Meunière
recipes.desc: The crispy skin of this fried hearty salmon puts its texture in a class all its own.

recipes.name: Salmon Risotto
recipes.desc: The rice used in this rich risotto permeates the light flavor of the salmon.

recipes.name: Crab Risotto
recipes.desc: An everyday stable of seaside villages, the secret to its delicious flavor lies in crab fat.

recipes.name: Vegetable Risotto
recipes.desc: The sweetness of the ingredients gives this risotto a mild flavor.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.desc: The tantalizing aroma of mushrooms and butter beckons you to the table.

recipes.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
recipes.desc: The creamy mushroom and vegetable soup is so chunky it eats like a meal!

recipes.name: Veggie Cream Soup
recipes.desc: This creamy soup showcases the sweetness of vegetables in a veritable taste explosion.

recipes.name: Creamy Meat Soup
recipes.desc: This nutritious soup contains serious portions of lightly-braised meat and many vegetables.

recipes.name: Creamy Seafood Soup
recipes.desc: Thuck-cut chunks of seafood and stock provides a satisfying savoriness.

recipes.name: Cream of Vegetable Soup
recipes.desc: Made by simmering vegetables in milk, this healthy dish is as simple as the ingredients.

recipes.name: Carrot Stew
recipes.desc: This simple stew sat simmering for a long time to bring out the sweetness of the carrots.

recipes.name: Mushroom Omelet
recipes.desc: The fluffy texture of this omelet is one of the great joys of this dish, as well as life.

recipes.name: Crab Omelet with Rice
recipes.desc: The fluffy crab legs pair perfectly with the rice for a truly scrumptious dish.

recipes.name: Gourmet Poultry Pilaf
recipes.desc: Made with the highest-quality poultry, every bite of this pilaf floods your mouth with flavor.

recipes.name: Prime Poultry Pilaf
recipes.desc: The rice permeates the savory taste of the poultry in this Gerudo-region favorite.

recipes.name: Poultry Pilaf
recipes.desc: Sautéed Hylian rice steamed in poultry broth. Cook on low heat until the rice is fluffy.

recipes.name: Vegetable Omelet
recipes.desc: This home-style dish mixes fluffy eggs with chopped vegetables for nutritional balance.

recipes.name: Porgy Meunière
recipes.desc: Popular among residents of coastal regions, this juicy porgy is a delish dish.

recipes.name: Seafood Meunière
recipes.desc: Rich butter flanks fresh seafood. The secret ingredient is lots and lots of love.

recipes.name: Seafood Fried Rice
recipes.desc: Various seafood has been sautéed with rice. The stronger the flame, the tastier the dish!

recipes.name: Curry Pilaf
recipes.desc: The goron spice used in this pilaf has given it a rich, spicy aroma.

recipes.name: Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl
recipes.desc: Only the most carefully selected cuts of high-quality meats go into this dish.

recipes.name: Prime Meat and Rice Bowl
recipes.desc: This bowl is loaded with high-quality meat. Your hunt for a serious meal ends here.

recipes.name: Meat and Rice Bowl
recipes.desc: This dish of rice and lightly seared meat is a mainstay all throughout Hyrule.

recipes.name: Fried Egg and Rice
recipes.desc: The soft egg yolk pairs well with the fresh rice in this simple dish.

recipes.name: Meaty Rice Balls
recipes.desc: The sweet and spicy meat stuffed into these rice balls will keep you full for some time.

recipes.name: Seafood Rice Balls
recipes.desc: Stuffed with aromatic seafood, the flavor can vary by ingredients but never disappoints.

recipes.name: Mushroom Rice Balls
recipes.desc: The aroma of the mushrooms tickles your nose as you peel back the leafy wrapping.

recipes.name: Veggie Rice Balls
recipes.desc: This home-style dish of Kakariko Village is stuffed with the bounty of the mountains.

recipes.name: Hot Buttered Apple
recipes.desc: The apple's sweetness has been enhanced by smothering it with butter and baking it.

recipes.name: Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin
recipes.desc: This hollow, meat-filled fortified pumpkin is a local specialty or Kakariko Village.

recipes.name: Glazed Meat
recipes.desc: The sweetness of the honey permeates the meat, giving it a complex taste profile.

recipes.name: Glazed Seafood
recipes.desc: A seafood dish that you can actually wolf down whole!

recipes.name: Glazed Mushrooms
recipes.desc: The honey in this mushroom dish gives it a sweet, complex taste and a savory finish.

recipes.name: Glazed Veggies
recipes.desc: Don't like the taste of vegetables? Simply sauté them in honey for a salty-sweet flavor!

recipes.name: Curry Rice
recipes.desc: A favorite all over Hyrule, this simple dish has a flavor you just won't get tired of.

recipes.name: Honeyed Apple
recipes.desc: A juicy sweet-and-sour dish combining newly ripened apples with honey.

recipes.name: Honeyed Fruits
recipes.desc: A dish that combines the thick sweetness of honey with the acidity of sour fruits.

recipes.name: Gourmet Spiced Meat Skewer
recipes.desc: The rich aroma and juicy texture of this high-quality meat puts it in a league of its own.

recipes.name: Prime Spiced Meat Skewer
recipes.desc: The simple preparation of this steak dish belies its complex taste profile.

recipes.name: Spiced Meat Skewer
recipes.desc: A special Goron spice covers up the scent of the meat, allowing its flavor to shine.

recipes.name: Fragrant Mushroom Sauté
recipes.desc: The fragrant aroma of this sautéed spice and mushroom dish makes your mouth water.

recipes.name: Herb Sauté
recipes.desc: A fragrant mixture of herbs and spices.It's easily recognized by its unique aroma.

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Gourmet Meat
recipes.desc: This lavish grilled dish makes liberal use of high-quality cuts of meat.

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Prime Meat
recipes.desc: A simple yet exquisite dish made by grilling high-quality meat on top of rock salt.

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Meat
recipes.desc: Short on ingredients? Just rub some meat in salt and cook it for a simple, tasty dish.

recipes.name: Crab Stir-Fry
recipes.desc: The Goron spice used in preparing this crab pairs perfectly with the flavor of the meat.

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Crab
recipes.desc: Nine out of ten fishermen agree: crab is best enjoyed grilled and with just a bit of salt.

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Fish
recipes.desc: A simple dish made by rolling a whole fish in natural rock salt before grilling it.

recipes.name: Wheat Bread
recipes.desc: Made with wheat from the Tabantha region, this soft, springy bread smells just heavenly.

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Greens
recipes.desc: A health-boosting dish made with leafy greens and a touch of salt.

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Mushrooms
recipes.desc: A basic mushroom dish made by lightly salting mushrooms and grilling them.

recipes.name: Copious Meat Skewers
recipes.desc: Just shove a bunch of meat on to a skewer and you're good to go.

recipes.name: Copious Fried Wild Greens
recipes.desc: A healthy dish made by cooking mixed greens over a strong flame.

recipes.name: Copious Simmered Fruit
recipes.desc: The flavors of the various fruits in this simmered dish exist in perfect harmony.

recipes.name: Copious Mushroom Skewers
recipes.desc: Fans of fungal cuisine can't resist this simple mushroom-skewer dish. Very filling.

recipes.name: Copious Seafood Skewers
recipes.desc: It's just a whole heap of stuff shoved on to a skewer, but it's still a pretty tasty dish.

recipes.name: Fried Wild Greens
recipes.desc: A basic vegetable dish made by sautéing fresh wild plants.

recipes.name: Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry
recipes.desc: A marriage of the choicest cuts of meat and seafood. As delicious as it is filling!

recipes.name: Prime Meat and Seafood Fry
recipes.desc: This comfort dish is made with choice cuts of meat and seafood.

recipes.name: Meat and Seafood Fry
recipes.desc: A filling dish made by cooking fresh seafood and meat together.

recipes.name: Pepper Steak
recipes.desc: A dish made by cooking meat in crushed peppers, suppressing the gamy taste while accentuating its flavor.

recipes.name: Pepper Seafood
recipes.desc: The pepper seeds grilled with this seafood draw out its taste and pleasant aroma.

recipes.name: Steamed Meat
recipes.desc: This meat dish has been wrapped in fragrant leaves and steamed to preserve its moisture.

recipes.name: Steamed Fish
recipes.desc: A refined dish made by wrapping a fresh fish in fragrant wild greens and cooking it.

recipes.name: Steamed Mushrooms
recipes.desc: A healthy vegetable dish achieved by steaming mushrooms in plant leaves.

recipes.name: Steamed Fruit
recipes.desc: A regional dish made by steaming near-ripened fruits in the leaves of fragrant plants.

recipes.name: Fish and Mushroom Skewer
recipes.desc: A simple dish made by cooking skewered, fresh fish alongside fragrant mushrooms.

recipes.name: Meat and Mushroom Skewer
recipes.desc: A filling dish made by grilling various mountain ingredients with either Raw Meat or Bird Meat.

recipes.name: Fruit and Mushroom Mix
recipes.desc: This dish contrasts the sweetness of fruit with the savoriness of mushrooms.

recipes.name: Meat Skewer
recipes.desc: A juicy, filling snack made by grilling small chunks of meat on a skewer.

recipes.name: Seafood Skewer
recipes.desc: The natural water in this medley of seafaring creatures makes for a delicious broth.

recipes.name: Fish Skewer
recipes.desc: A simple dish made by cooking chunks of fresh fish on a skewer.

recipes.name: Omelet
recipes.desc: This simple dish is common all over Hyrule. Simply fry egg until it's nice and plump.

recipes.name: Warm Milk
recipes.desc: Make this by heating up some milk. Drink it before bed to ensure a good night's sleep.

recipes.name: Mushroom Skewer
recipes.desc: This simple mushroom-packed skewer has its colorful presentation to thank for its appeal.

recipes.name: Fried Wild Greens
recipes.desc: A basic vegetable dish made by sautéing fresh wild plants.

recipes.name: Simmered Fruit
recipes.desc: This sweet dish is made by heaping tasty fruits into a pan and simmering until tender.

recipes.name: Sautéed Nuts
recipes.desc: These sautéed tree seeds are the perfect snack for the busy adventurer on the go!

recipes.name: Fairy Tonic
recipes.desc: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.

recipes.name: Fairy Tonic
recipes.desc: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.

recipes.name: Fairy Tonic
recipes.desc: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.

recipes.name: Fairy Tonic
recipes.desc: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.

recipes.name: Sautéed Peppers
recipes.desc: The spiciness of these sautéed peppers has been broken by the heat for a sweeter taste.

recipes.name: Honey Candy
recipes.desc: A natural sweet, brimming with nutrition and made by stewing fresh honey.

recipes.name: Rock-Hard Food
recipes.desc: A dish gone awry after adding the wrong ingredient. Chewing your way through this won't be fun, but it will fill you up when you're between a rock and a hard place.

dubiousFood.name: Dubious Food
dubiousFood.desc: It's too gross to even look at. A bizarre smell issues forth from this heap. Eating it won't hurt you though... probably.

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Monster Curry
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: This unusual take on curry uses monster extract and doesn't rely on spices.

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Monster Rice Balls
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: Rice balls flavored with monster extract. Their unique aroma is not for everyone.

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Monster Cake
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: It's said that once you have a taste of this cake, you'll never forget its sweetness.

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Nutcake
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: Forest nuts give this cake a pleasant texture and a simple, understated sweetness.

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Curry Pilaf
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: The goron spice used in this pilaf has given it a rich, spicy aroma.

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Curry Rice
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: A favorite all over Hyrule, this simple dish has a flavor you just won't get tired of.

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Wheat Bread
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: Made with wheat from the Tabantha region, this soft, springy bread smells just heavenly.

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Sautéed Nuts
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: These sautéed tree seeds are the perfect snack for the busy adventurer on the go!

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Fairy Tonic
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Fairy Tonic
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Fairy Tonic
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.

additiveOnlyRecipes.name: Fairy Tonic
additiveOnlyRecipes.desc: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.

hearty.foodDesc: Restores your health and temporarily increases your maximum hearts.
hearty.elixirDesc: Restores you to full health and increases your maximum hearts. The additional hearts are lost as you take damage.

energizing.foodDesc: Instantly refills some of your Stamina Wheel.
energizing.elixirDesc: Restores your Stamina, which is used when performing physical actions such as climbing walls and swimming.

enduring.foodDesc: Restores and overfills your Stamina Wheel.
enduring.elixirDesc: Restores stamina and temporarily extends your Stamina Wheel. The additional stamina will disappear as it's used.

sneaky.elixirDesc: Grants a %s-level stealth effect, which calms the nerves and silences footfalls. Allows you to move about undetected by monsters and animals.

hasty.elixirDesc: Grants a %s-level haste effect, which boosts your movement speed while running, swimming, or climbing.

mighty.elixirDesc: Grants a %s-level might effect, which strengthens your body and mind to boost your attack power with all weapons.

tough.elixirDesc: Grants a %s-level toughness effect, which fortifies your bones to strengthen your defense. Best to use before facing off against hard-hitting enemies.

spicy.elixirDesc: Warms your body from its core, increasing your resistance to cold environments. Very useful in the snow-covered mountains.

chilly.elixirDesc: Grants a %s-level cooling effect, raising your body's resistance to heat. Crucial for long journeys through the desert.

electro.elixirDesc: Grants a %s-level resistance to electricity. Useful against enemies with electrical attacks.

fireproof.elixirDesc: Grants a fireproof effect, which prevents your body from catching fire. Be sure to pack this when venturing out to explore Death Mountain.
